title: Order: Quick Start PoC
subtitle: Fill out the form and receive your prototype within 24h

step1.title: What's your name and how can we contact you?
step1.description: We need your details to send you the finished prototype and stay in touch during development. Example: John Doe, john@company.com, +48 123 456 789

step2.title: What problem does your application solve?
step2.description: Briefly describe the specific user problem you want to solve. Example: "Entrepreneurs waste time on manual invoicing" or "Students don't know how to plan their exam preparation"
step2.placeholder: My application solves the problem of...

step3.title: Who is your target customer?
step3.description: Define exactly who your application is for. Example: "Small businesses employing 5-20 people" or "Students preparing for exams"

step4.title: What are the 3 most important features of your application?
step4.description: List the key functionalities that must be in the prototype. Example: "User registration", "Dashboard with statistics", "Export data to PDF"

step5.title: How do you envision the application's appearance?
step5.description: Choose the style that best fits your application, or provide examples of websites/apps you like.

step6.title: When do you need the prototype?
step6.description: We typically deliver prototypes within 1-2 business days. If you need it faster or have a specific deadline, let us know.

step7.title: Order Summary
step7.description: Review your details before submitting the order

success.title: Thank you for your order!
success.message: Your order has been submitted. We will contact you shortly.

error.title: An error occurred
error.message: Failed to submit order. Please try again.
